snips.snip:
TICK_LENGTH = 15

whilePressed = ($parse, $interval) ->
  restrict: "A"

  link: (scope, elem, attrs) ->
    action = $parse(attrs.whilePressed)
    intervalPromise = null

    bindWhilePressed = ->
      elem.on('mousedown', beginAction)

    bindEndAction = ->
      elem.on('mouseup', endAction)
      elem.on('mouseleave', endAction)

    unbindEndAction = ->
      elem.off('mouseup', endAction)
      elem.off('mouseleave', endAction)

    beginAction = (e) ->
      e.preventDefault()
      tickAction()
      intervalPromise = $interval(tickAction, TICK_LENGTH)
      bindEndAction()

    endAction = ->
      $interval.cancel(intervalPromise)
      unbindEndAction()

    tickAction = ->
      action(scope)

    bindWhilePressed()

snips.snip: UPDATE AgLibraryKeyword SET includeParents = 0 WHERE includeParents = 1

forever start js/server.js

You should be able to see it here

ps axl | grep node

And here

forever list

You can kill it using

forever stop 0

Where 0 is the index of your code in the forever list.

# Note the new setup script name for Node.js v0.12
curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_0.12 | sudo bash -

# Then install with:
sudo apt-get install -y nodejs

one off

$ PORT=80 node js/server.js

More permanently:

$ export PORT=80
$ node app.js

sudo nano ~/.gitconfig

You can use the follow commands to add in the required information.

git config --global user.name "calitek"
git config --global user.email github@calitek.com

You can see all of your settings with this command:

git config --list
